timeline.message:
Fixed hiding tool versions

dockstore/dockstore#3741

Hiding a tool version no longer returns a 400 error: Unable to process
JSON

Cause of the issue was that versionMetadata that is passed from the UI
can be null, which causes a NullPointerException when used with addAll()

Added a check to ensure that parsedInformationSet is not NULL
Added an additional test for the fix

timeline.bodyText: This looks like it occurred in a different PR, please create a ticket to make a CI build fail if this file is changing but not checked in.
timeline.author: denis-yuen

timeline.bodyText:
Oh, I see the reason for Gary's comment. We should not be able to blank the version data by API this way.
Set just the hidden attribute to avoid breakage when we fix this
timeline.author: denis-yuen

replies.bodyText: @garyluu Yeah I misunderstood, I also agree we should not be able to blank the version metadata directly.
replies.author: agduncan94

replies.bodyText: Reverted the integration test to what it was on develop. No need to add new tests as current tests already set the hidden attribute.
replies.author: ByteMap

timeline.message: Updated comment specifying deserializer as the reason for checker
Merge branch 'feature/3741/fixHidingToolVersions' of github.com:dockstore/dockstore into feature/3741/fixHidingToolVersions
